name: Public House
description: An establishment offering food, drink, or lodging; adventurers can rest, meet informants, or overhear tavern talk.
atmosphere: The public house has a welcoming, community atmosphere with the scent of hearty food and the sound of friendly conversation and local gossip. The air carries the promise of hospitality and the essential nature of public gathering, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of local community and the exchange of news and information.
